thread.title: BRIEF-Noble Midstream Partners And Greenfield Midstream Close On DJ Basin Acquisition

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Noble Midstream Partners And Greenfield Midstream Close On DJ Basin Acquisition

organizations.name: brief-noble midstream partners and greenfield midstream close on dj basin acquisition

text:
Jan 31 (Reuters) - Noble Midstream Partners LP:
* NOBLE MIDSTREAM PARTNERS AND GREENFIELD MIDSTREAM CLOSE ON DJ BASIN ACQUISITION
* NOBLE MIDSTREAM PARTNERS LP - AGGREGATE PURCHASE PRICE FOR ACQUISITION WAS APPROXIMATELY $638.5 MILLION IN CASH Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
